page.description: Returns the name of the control that has focus.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.ACTIVE() method returns the name of the control with focus. If the .T. flag is specified, then a fully qualified name is returned. E.g. : sales.active(.T.) Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script returns the name of the control on the Sales form that has focus.
